text: 18.8 Mat 5.30, Mak 9.43 Ñɨn kɨd akaŋ, tob kɨd nad olap tap si tap tɨmel gɨnɨg gonɨmuŋ, pɨs kɨd anɨb ak tɨbɨlɨkɨl dɨyokɨnɨmɨn agak. Nak ñɨn kɨd nokom olap akaŋ, tob kɨd nokom olap yenɨgab ak, pel mɨdep ak dɨnɨgaban, teplep yɨbɨl agak. Pen ñɨn nak kɨd omɨŋal akaŋ, tob kɨd omɨŋal yenɨgab ak, mab ke yɨneb amnɨgaban, tɨmel yɨbɨl agak.
